Looks like the MadFermentationist recipe - what's the reasoning behind the corn?
http://www.themadfermentationist.com/2015/06/hop-juice-north-east-ipa-recipe.html

Sheesh â€“ so sorry I just saw this now. Michael T says, "These two adjuncts work counter, with the corn diluting the protein content of the wort while the wheat increases it." He also admitted, though, that he "had it sitting around." Not sure it matters as much as getting the hop schedule and dry hop timing right to keep everything in suspension, tho. I still haven't brewed it...soon.
